metadata.title: golang: net/http: insufficient sanitization of Host header (moderate)
metadata.description: DOCUMENTATION: A flaw was found in Golang, where it is vulnerable to HTTP header injection caused by improper content validation of the Host header by the HTTP/1 client. A remote attacker can inject arbitrary HTTP headers by persuading a victim to visit a specially crafted Web page. This flaw allows the attacker to conduct various attacks against the vulnerable system, including Cross-site scripting, cache poisoning, or session hijacking.

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7 is installed
yggdrasil-worker-forwarder is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
